<h3 id="前言">前言</h3>
<p>之前我已经陆续出了 3 篇蓝牙收和 2 篇蓝牙发的视频，将蓝牙 BLE 广播收发的协议栈讲的非常清楚了：</p>
<p><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/history_ble_video.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><sup>图片来源：<a href="https://www.beautifulzzzz.com/gnuradio/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.beautifulzzzz.com/gnuradio/</a></sup></p>
<p><a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1ta4y157VV/?spm_id_from=333.1387.collection.video_card.click" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/video1.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></a> <a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV18h4y1Y7mf/?spm_id_from=333.1387.collection.video_card.click" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/video2.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></a> <a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Q84y1D7tZ/?spm_id_from=333.1387.collection.video_card.click" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/video3.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></a> <a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1VT421k7cA/?spm_id_from=333.1387.collection.video_card.click" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/video4.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></a> <a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1WWv1emEvA/?spm_id_from=333.1387.collection.video_card.click" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/video5.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></a></p>
<p><strong>这里将其单独拎出来组成一个 BLE + SDR 的专题，用于汇总关于蓝牙协议栈在 SDR 上实现的各种技术点。</strong></p>
<br>
<h3 id="一开题之作"><a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1bARMYLEGX/?vd_source=84f94348691c2906fc1038d54989b7e0" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">一、开题之作</a></h3>
<p>为了方便后续代码构建，我将之前零零散散的关于 BLE+SDR 的相关工程代码，全部合并到一个独立仓库中 <a href="https://github.com/nbtool/auto_test_tool" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">auto_test_tool</a>。</p>
<p><sup><strong>PS：</strong> 这个仓库是之前我的一个很老的仓库，用于编写一些简单的自动化测试的 python 串口工具，因为里面有些组件整合适合 BLE 广播包的解析与发送，因此就在这里附加了。</sup></p>
<p>为了防止后续的课程对代码修改导致老课程不方便复现，我这里每个课程都会生成一个 tag，这样每个课程都可以拉取对应的 tag 来还原现场。比如，我们这个开题之作采用的是 <code>ble_course_1</code>，因此可以使用下面三种方式拉取代码：</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>方法</th>
<th>命令</th>

</tr>
</thead>

<br>
<p>OK，开题相关的铺垫到此结束，那么硬核的东西也不能少：</p>
<p><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/jia_gou.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>如上图，我将之前的所有 BLE 广播包接收教程的代码全部重新整理，形成上图所示能兼容 hackrf、plutosdr、limesdr 和 zmq 等不同 SDR 源的蓝牙广播接收解析系统（抓包器）。</p>
<p>具体的教程细节见：<a href="https://github.com/nbtool/auto_test_tool/tree/master/app/app_sdr_ble_adv_rx" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">app/app_sdr_ble_adv_rx</a></p>
<br>
<h3 id="二动态发送-ble-广播包"><a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1mNRhYGE5n/?vd_source=e07622425aaa33ca0b1e9dafa0807cf4" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">二、动态发送 BLE 广播包</a></h3>
<p>上节我们将 BLE 广播包接收代码进行全部整理，本节我们将 BLE 广播包发送代码进行全部整理，实现每隔 1S 更换广播内容，并从零开始合成 BLE 广播 IQ 数据，然后调用 SDR 发送，实现 BLE 动态广播能力：</p>
<p><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/BLE_ADV__jia_gou.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>具体的教程细节见：<a href="https://github.com/nbtool/auto_test_tool/tree/master/app/app_sdr_ble_adv_tx" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">app/app_sdr_ble_adv_tx</a></p>
<br>
<h3 id="三基于-plutosdr-实现-ble-广播包的收发一体能力"><a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1bDQ5YdEMC/?vd_source=84f94348691c2906fc1038d54989b7e0" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">三、基于 PlutoSDR 实现 BLE 广播包的收发一体能力</a></h3>
<p>本节将前两节的知识结合起来，借助具有全双工双收双发能力的 PlutoSDR 实现 BLE 广播包收发一体能力：</p>
<p><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/BLE_TX_RX_jia_gou.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>具体的教程细节见：<a href="https://github.com/nbtool/auto_test_tool/tree/master/app/app_sdr_ble_adv_tx_rx" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">app/app_sdr_ble_adv_tx_rx</a></p>
<br>
<h3 id="四基于-plutosdr-的-ble-广播包的收发实现接入涂鸦智能-app">四、基于 PlutoSDR 的 BLE 广播包的收发实现接入涂鸦智能 APP</h3>
<p>本节在上一节的基础上更进一步：通过叠加 TuyaOS BeaconMesh 上层应用协议，最终实现从电磁波开始，到全双工蓝牙广播收发接入涂鸦智能，变成一个物联网 BeaconMesh 灯节点：</p>
<p><img src="https://tuchuang.beautifulzzzz.com:3000/?path=202503/BLE_TX_RX_TO_TUYA_jia_gou.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>具体的教程细节见：<a href="https://github.com/nbtool/auto_test_tool/tree/master/app/app_sdr_tuya_beacon_node" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">app/app_sdr_tuya_beacon_node</a></p>
